website_summaries.verdict: Bright and cheery, this system gives you all the safety advantages Britax offers with a fashionable look.
pros: Safety standards on this infant seat are higher than federal standards
Stroller can handle babies 4 to 55 lbs
Base for infant seat has center straps that are easy to tighten and secure
cons: This model comes with a higher price tag than other Britax travel systems

customer_reviews.title: Base for car seat
customer_reviews.text: I dont Like that the picture show the base for the car seat and it does not come with and it to much money to buy it on the side especially because the system was so expensive I would like a call back and also don’t k ow if it’s a used product as it didn’t say
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Gasca

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw several pictures online but was still unsure of exactly what the color would be, I was so happy to receive this product and it be the color I hoped for! It is what I would call a true red, some pictures almost made it look burgundy. It was super easy to assembly, literally just snapped the wheels on and velcro the visor on.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, this travel system is adorable and simple to use. Ergonomics are well designed, latching to the base is simple, detaching is as well. The stroller is easy to set up and folds with just one hand. Full disclosure, I watched Britax videos on YouTube to learn how it all worked. The canopy of the car seat works in unison with the stroller. 👍
customer_reviews.author: camper

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat and travel system/stroller could not be any easier! Breeze to assemble (both car seat base and stroller), lightweight enough and great mobility. When there is so many things as a new parent we worry about, the safety and durability of this Britax system is not one of my worries. Beautiful and sleek looking is a bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Arens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stroller, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller, light weight stroller, heavy duty car seat, super easy to collapse. Fits great in car (honda civic trunk). Bought the Britax organizer as well for cup holders. Love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Journi Moore

customer_reviews.title: Will stick with britax brand
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for 2 months now and couldn’t be happier with our choice. The car seat is a little heavy but it feels like very good quality, baby loves the stripes on the inside, and she looks very snug and cozy. Very easy to install and take car seat in and out. Stroller is very nice just wish the storage was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality not so great design
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this stroller car seat combo is great and it is also stylish. However there is no cup holder which can be quite annoying. The standard universal stroller cup holders don’t work well with this stroller. The storage basket at the bottom is also so far under the seat that you can hardly fit anything in there.
customer_reviews.author: Tyelynn Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but heavy, stitching coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that I feel my child is safe. Stroller folds up and down easily and the car seat snaps in easily. However this car seat seems to be a lot heavier than most car seats, and I’m no whimp. Only complaint is the stitching coming out/undone on car seat after just a few weeks of use with my tiny 6lb baby.
customer_reviews.author: KristenW

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Has some features I really like. But also missing some that I wish it had. Stroller has no front bar or tray for baby. Bought it because it was a system but better off getting separate pieces
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great, but arrived with a broken peice
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is lovely and we believe the mother-to-be will love it, although it came with a defective part that she was going to try and call the manufacturer for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. It's a heavy set, especially the carseat. Stroller drives/turns easily and with little effort. Took me a minute to figure out the fold function, but I like it overall
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Travel System
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It's so beautiful. I wish they sold the car seat separate. I feel rich when I pull this set out cause no one else has it. Lol!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Incredible

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and usage. Only thing I would change is how to fold but once you understand it’s simple. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is being used for my nephew. Love color is great and it’s easy to fold and pull back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this is the best travel system I’ve ever purchased. The carrier is so soft and cushiony...it looks better in person. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: BraveMom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Car seat is very light weight and stroller is easy to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Lyell

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It is a little pricey but the material is durable and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Cerecedo

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller. Our son is 8 months old and we are still using it for him. It is easy to fold. We like that you can lay it all the way down for when baby is sleeping. Great colors. We get complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: JSwift

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Son and Daughter in law loved it. All ready for new baby girl
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. They enjoyed receiving it and love using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck H.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson #2 present
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it, but my son and daughter in-law requested this item and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best stroller we have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing we could wish for is a 3 seater, otherwise this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Kreller

customer_reviews.title: I haven't talked to my Grandson how he likes it yet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great granddaughter who will be born in December. So..I don't know how they like it yet!! This is what the parents picked out. Maybe later I can write what they say about it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this so far. As soon as bambino arrives will update again
customer_reviews.author: 4everZoie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality with wonderful color scheme. I love that it is so versital and easy to use from car to stroller. It's been great for trips to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it very easy snaps in and out of car
customer_reviews.author: stormy

customer_reviews.title: Best Carseat
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and this seat is worth the money. It feels like my baby is nice and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the first one i used so i cant compare witb others. It does the job and is pretty safe for your kid
customer_reviews.author: Bhavya

customer_reviews.title: safety first
customer_reviews.text: I love the carseat and stroller. Easy to operate and it took me like 10 mins to take it out of the box and put together. You can feel that its a really safe carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Scallan

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: I love the color I car seat is very comfy
customer_reviews.author: elease johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this stroller & car seat. I love the color & pattern
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Cabana
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The quality is amazing!! If you’re thinking to buy do it, add to chart and purchase! You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ashle

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Super! Love how bright the colors are. Very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Powell

customer_reviews.title: It is great quality material
customer_reviews.text: Awesome combo!! Well made and worth the price. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, however car seat is heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this travel system. It’s easy to assemble, car seat latches on to stroller with no difficulties and can fold with one hand. The only thing I didn’t like is that the car seat is heavy and feels heavier with baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy D

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is super easy to push and turns well. I agree with others that it should come with bottle holder and some attachment to the handle for storage but I bought one for $20 so not expensive. I picked this travel system for the safety rating. I don’t find the car seat to be too heavy but again the safety of it takes priority. The system itself is very easy to use, click in and out and carseat base was simple to install too. I got directions in the box but YouTube I’m sure has a video if you didn’t get them. Very satisfied with this, especially since it wasn’t $900 like UppaBaby.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I love britax!
customer_reviews.text: My pet peeve about carseats for babies and toddlers is how difficult they are to get in and out. Who has money to buy more than one really expensive carseat? We have two vehicles we use to drive our son around and constantly need to move the carseat. Britax rocked it with their design. Easy to get in and out. Easy to move carseat to stroller. So easy. Safe too- great safety ratings and I feel great about having a Britax. Cannot rave highly enough about Britax- love their carseats and strollers for ease of use. Also easy to clean- if such a thing exists when removing carseat padding to wash- this was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Uncompromising Quality
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to kids you don't compromise on safety. This ktravel system delivers quality in spades. Even better it is easy to assemble asnd use. the stroller itself is attractive. the canopy is large and prvides UV portection while the storage is more than adequate. The foam wheels and all wheel suspension provides a smooth and comfy ride. the car seat is top notch. It is comes with the base and is hassle free to install. the system is light but sturdy. Safety comes first when it comes to kids and it is nice not to hae to sacrifice comfort or quality to keep your youngsters secure.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Walsh

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for 1st time parents. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: As soon to be parents of 10 children, my wife and I have seen more than our fair share of car seats and strollers in the past two decades. Britax has been our brand of choice for many years. We selected the Pathway & B-Safe Ultra Travel System as a gift for one of our good friends who is expecting her first baby this spring. They are expecting a boy, so they especially thought the cowmooflage design was very appropriate. They told me unboxing and setup took less than 20 minutes. The stroller and car seat are now patiently waiting in their nursery for when their special little one finally arrives. Rating: 5 stars. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Tabatt

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller/infant seat combo
customer_reviews.text: Nice travel set! The Britax seat is one of the safest on the market (I just recently read that it was Britax that created the LATCH system! How awesome is that?!). It seems comfortable for my baby, too. You can use the included adapters to use the infant seat in the stroller, which is very convenient. The stroller seat holds up to 55 pounds which is great. My large toddler fits in this stroller no problem! It still steers great with her in it, too. The fabric on this is nice and the canopy is nice and large. All in all, very happy with this travel system!
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: Britax is Superb Safety
customer_reviews.text: Car Seat = 5 stars, Stroller - 4 stars. This car seat is classic Britax quality which means it's a little on the heavier side compared to some more affordable car seats but WORTH IT and the cow print is adorable. You can't go wrong with a Britax car seat and they hold up for years, multiple kids if no accidents. The stroller is great because it's also cute and light. The lightness makes it feel a little bit less of the same quality of the car seats but I suppose you don't need the same safety measures and it makes it easier to take around.
customer_reviews.author: StyleSnob

customer_reviews.title: A quality and a well designed travel system
customer_reviews.text: A classy and very functional travel system from one of the best and safest makers on child car seat systems. You cannot go wrong here as quality and safety are what every parent seeks for their baby. Simple assembly and comfortable design for both child and parents. Minor gripe is the lack of cup holders which I would prefer but there are probably others who view them as unneeded
customer_reviews.author: tim can

customer_reviews.title: Our Second Britax Set, Love 'Em
customer_reviews.text: Britax is such good quality. You really want the set because they work with each other so well. You get to the store, unhook the car seat from the base, mount it to the stroller and off you go, baby stays intact. How can you not love that? The baby seat is so well built and padded and the stroller is strong yet it absorbs sidewalk rumble very well. And the cow print lining is off the chart, everybody goes bonkers. The unit is strong but surprisingly lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Another superb britax product
customer_reviews.text: We have another kiddo on the way so we were on the lookout for a new car seat. The Britax one came in a a big box but was easy to assemble. The car seat came as one piece and was easy to install (the car seat clinic folks also had good words for it). The stroller took a few mins to put together but was very easy and is very lightweight. It's easy to fold and the car seat smoothly fit onto it. It's easy to put in and remove as well. Overall a solid buy for its price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wanchoo

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: I've reviewed many stroller travel systems over the years, and this is a really good one. Excellent quality, easy to assemble and it functions perfectly. Lots of clever storage and a pleasure to wheel about, very lightweight. The car seat works great as well. Living in Hawaii, I love how UV proof the canopy is. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Britax Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality unit, perfect for a family with a new little one. As a stroller / car seat convertible, it really shines for trips and outings where convenience and space are priorities. It is sturdy yet easy to assemble and cleans up nicely. Very satisfied with this as I have been with all of the Britax baby products I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Britax Pathway & B-Safe Ultra Travel System, Cowmooflage
customer_reviews.text: Well built and durable, I feel safe with my child in this stroller wherever we go. It’s easy to push and I struggle very little with it. The included car seat is an added bonus, as I don’t have to buckle and unbuckle my child when going from the car to the stroller, and visa versa. Great product, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate this set. Comes in a huge box, well protected. Within are separately boxed stroller and the loose car seat. Easy connection for car seat, easy folding on stroller. After a little research I felt very comfortable that this is a safe option, and I am very happy with the relatively light weight and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Hannah

product_meta.title: Britax Pathway & B-Safe 35 Travel System, Connect
product_meta.description: Style:TS B-Safe 35| Color:ConnectTurn heads on every stroll with the Pathway/B Safe 35 Travel System combining the Britax Pathway Lightweight Stroller, the Britax B Safe 35 Infant Car Seat with base, and the Britax car seat adapters in one convenient box. Both car seat and stroller feature bold, colorful patterns peeking out from below the UV 50+ canopy. The Pathway Stroller is lightweight for easy transport and its maneuverable, swivel front 4 wheel design allows you to stroll effortlessly. A linked parking brake locks both rear wheels with a single step. The one hand fold stroller features an all wheel suspension system that offers a smooth, comfortable ride. A zippered storage pocket and an extra large basket make it easy to bring along everything you need. The B Safe 35 Infant Car Seat is engineered with Britax’s top safety technologies. The seat features a layer of side impact protection and the patented SafeCell Impact Protection System includes a steel frame, energy absorbing base, V shaped tether to minimize seat rotation and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement in the event of a crash. Easy installation using SafeCenter Latch and built in lock offs makes it simple to secure the infant car seat base. The B Safe 35 car seat is FAA approved without the base. Using the included adapter, you can securely attach the infant car seat to the stroller to make a brilliant travel system that is perfect for your on the go lifestyle. The B Safe 35 Infant Car Seat can be used 4 35 pounds, height 32” or less. The Pathway Stroller can be used from birth to 55 pounds. Stroller dimensions 29" L x 23" W x 11" H. Infant Car Seat dimensions 17.75” W x 25” H x 26.5” D, harness slot heights 5 to 11 inches.
feature_bullets: Travel system includes B Safe 35 infant car seat and base, Pathway Stroller, and car seat adapters
Surrounded in safety: Car seat has a layer of side impact protection, steel frame, and impact absorbing base
Lightweight 4 wheel stroller design with near flat recline and 1 hand quick fold for easy transport
Relax & Recline: Ensure the best vehicle installation and accommodate sleeping children; Install with Latch or built in seat belt lock offs to secure the infant car seat

Fit: B Safe Ultra infant car seat rear facing 4 to 35 pounds, seat area 13 inch D, 8.75 inch W; Dimensions 17.75 inch W x 25 inch H x 30.62 inch D. Pathway Stroller birth to 55 pounds; Maximum unfolded dimensions 29 inch L x 23 inch W x 11 inch H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars161 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
